title: Clean up Submission Log add-submission dropdowns with integrated search + live filtering

requirements.text: Update the four belt “Add submission…” controls in the Submission Log (the four selected combobox trigger buttons) to use a cleaner dropdown pattern where the full submission options list live-filters as the user types, and the search field is visually integrated with the add-submission control (i.e., the search input is cleanly located in/at the top of the dropdown experience rather than feeling separate from the trigger). Apply changes only to the selected add-submission controls (the four belt combobox triggers), implemented via frontend/src/components/SubmissionSelectInput.tsx.

quotes: Create a cleaner Search/Filters Dropdowns where the complete list filters as you search for them. The search field area should be cleanly located where the add submission buttons with a nice dropdown.

acceptanceCriteria: Each belt’s add-submission control opens a dropdown that shows the complete options list by default and filters the list in real time as the user types.
The search input is presented as part of the dropdown experience in a clean, compact way (no visually awkward separation between the trigger and the search field).
The dropdown remains keyboard-accessible (type to filter, arrow keys to navigate, enter to select) and closes upon selection.
No other Submission Log elements outside the four selected add-submission controls are modified.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the four selected elements (the four belt add-submission combobox trigger buttons) and the minimal supporting code necessary to implement them (i.e., SubmissionSelectInput.tsx).
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
nonGoals: Do not remove the plus/minus controls on submission tags (not part of the selected elements in this prompt).
Do not change submission tag sizing/layout (not part of the selected elements in this prompt).
Do not change or remove the Submission Log Save button behavior (not part of the selected elements in this prompt).
Do not change backend data models or persistence behavior.
